resources.string: Enter a decimal number with dot and/or comma

1. Enter a decimal number like 1.20 or 1,20 in the text field below.

2. Enter the same number in the second field.

3. Click the send button.

4. Do the same with a big number like 1,000.20 or 1.000,20.

 The first text field only allows decimals (inputType = numericDecimal). The text field below shows the converted number value using your current language settings.
The second text field allows in addition decimal separators (digits="0123456789,.").
The data below will be shared with openintents.org when pressing the send button:
